title: There's got to be a better way!
description: From Reformist RL to the principle of certainty equivalence.
content: You might come away from Tuesday and Wednesdays posts thinking Im a fan of Reformist RL. I am decidedly not, so let me clarify my position. I am a fan of the clarity the Reformist perspective brings.… [+7291 chars]
